A

Action - Interface in agent.core.actions

Interface for the low level actions
Takes the Agent that will executes the action and the parameters of the actions as parameters

C

chainRules() - Method in class agent.core.swrlagent.SWRLAgent
Heart of the Behaviour, this method fires the rules in chain to go through the automata and start the related actions.

Properties file
config - Variable in class agent.core.memory.SWRLMemory
 
conn - Variable in class agent.core.memory.SWRLMemory
Instanceof database connection object
CREATE_MODEL - Variable in class agent.core.memory.Config
If True it creates model in RDB (MySQL) when agent is started
We need to set this True only first time when running agent or if we want to recreate model from OWL files in case of recreating we need to set REMOVE_MODEL True as well in order to remove old model first OWl files which contains of Ontology definition and Ontology individuals (Instances) are defined in Ontology Config see: SOURCE_FILE, INDIVIDUALS_FILE
createBehaviourMessage(SWRLAgent, String, Vector<SWRLImp>) - Static method in class agent.core.communication.Message
Build a messsage with content rules as String in Manchester Notation
createInformMessage(SWRLAgent, String, Resource) - Static method in class agent.core.communication.Message
This method creates ACL Inform message containing of RDF of some Jena RDF Resource
createModel() - Method in class agent.core.memory.SWRLMemory
Creates OWL model out of defined SOURCE_FILE in OWL database and store this model see: SOURCE_FILE, INDIVIDUALS_FILE
createProperty(String) - Method in class agent.core.memory.SWRLMemory
Creates ontology property out ofstring represenation
createQueryMessage(SWRLAgent, String, String) - Static method in class agent.core.communication.Message
This method creates ACL Query message

MEM_MODEL - Variable in class agent.core.memory.Config
If True it reades model from FILE defined in ontology config properties and holds model in memory instead of MySQL database it is faster but not very good solution.

OWL_FOOT - Static variable in class agent.core.onto.Ontology

and adds inferenced model as submodel of agent

ReceiveBehaviourAction - Class in agent.core.actions
Implementation of Behaviour Reception - Receive the rules in the message, parse and add in the Knowledge Base

Uses Protege Model to parse Rules, model is then converted as a Jena Model and replace the former Jena model.
ReceiveBehaviourAction() - Constructor for class agent.core.actions.ReceiveBehaviourAction
 
register(SWRLAgent, String) - Static method in class agent.core.communication.Message
This method register agent with directory facilitator

SendBehaviourAction - Class in agent.core.actions

Receiver parameter name : SendTo
